content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Arsenal + São Paulo FC + Southampton Thursday + Saturday Football Prediction Contest!Game 1:  Arsenal v FC Zürich  (Thursday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/uefa-europa-league/fc-zurich-v-arsenal-fc-630a7d4eff0a2ac3b5e51a28Game 2:  São Paulo FC v Atlético Clube Goianiense  (Thursday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/copa-sudamericana/sao-paulo-fc-sp-v-ac-goianiense-go-6311b5703f5527ff648dbc9dGame 3:  Southampton v Brentford  (Saturday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/southampton-fc-v-brentford-fc-630fb04a901f2439124dde0dRulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  20'  2-0 ArsenalGame 2:  20'  2-0 São Paulo FCGame 3:  20'  1-0 SouthamptonPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mbtc!(Small print) *The declared winners are final and up to my discretion*
